price: Nokorε sε, wo Wura Nyankopͻn de N’atemmuo no bebu wͻn ntεm atεn. Ɔne Otumfoͻ a Otumi ade nyinaa yε, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ no.
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُم بِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum biḥuk'mihi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
